abstract: Powerset opens the kimono, a bit, hoping to turn skeptics into believers
snippet: Powerset opens the kimono, a bit, hoping to turn skeptics into believers
lead_paragraph: Powerset, a once-secretive, 70-person startup in San Francisco, has a problem: its goal to build a search engine that is both different and better than Google is so ambitious and improbable that it faces a large chorus of skeptics.
